                    java.lang.String sex,

                    java.lang.String weight,
                    java.lang.String build,

                    java.lang.String hair,
                    java.util.Date incidentDate,
                    java.lang.String reference,
                    java.lang.String caseNum,
                    java.lang.String status,
                    java.lang.String weapon,
                    java.lang.String preparedBy,
                    java.lang.String approvedBy,
                    java.util.Date prepDate,
                    java.lang.String otherDescrip,
                    java.lang.String narrative)
             throws java.lang.Exception
Adds a new crime to the crime table in the database. This method adds the most basic data that every crime entry must have.

Parameters:
caseNum - - the case number associated with the crime
location - - the location of the crime
offCode - - the offense code of the crime
incident - - the incident associated with the crime
time - - the time of the crime occurrence
date - - the date of the crime occurrence
remarks - - remarks associated with the crime
status - - the crime's status
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

convertDateToEpoch

public static long convertDateToEpoch(java.util.Date date)
Converts a Date object into a long representing the number of seconds elapsed since the epoch.

Parameters:
date - - Date object to convert
Returns:
long value representing time in seconds since epoch

convertEpochToDate

public static java.util.Date convertEpochToDate(long epoch)
Converts a long value representing time in seconds since epoch into a Date object representing the same time.

Parameters:
epoch - - time in seconds since epoch
Returns:
Date object representing the given time

getBOLOsFromDB

public static java.util.ArrayList<Bolo> getBOLOsFromDB()
                                                throws java.lang.Exception
Retrives all the BOLOs from the database and places them into an Arraylist of BOLO objects, which is returned to the caller.

Returns:
an arraylist of BOLO objects
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
